title: Teacher?
body: Hey guys, Just lookin around to see if there is anyone willing to help and/or teach me so i can get better at ranked. I am striving for myself getting into a high place in LoL. But yea, small steps first. Just throwing this out there.

replies.body:
Hey y0killer dude,

It seems you've been building Archangel's Staff on every AP champ.
~~for reals, on vlad though?~~

Yes it is good for selected champs but you shouldn't build it on every Ap champ.

You also need to work your CSing. 15cs = 1 kill.

Yea, usually I go with the same build for my ap champs because of the fact that all ap champs are mana whores, and i dont run out of mana usually after I got archangels staff. also the fact that it gives 80 ap and when you have casted a certain amount of abillities it grows the the seraph's embrace{{item:3040}} which gives a sheild (helpful in later game if you need a thin escape)
But there are so many items that scale differently with every champion, it would just be a waste of space to get Seraph.

I can try and help, you seem new. 
For starters I might suggest normals for  a bit, and practice every role.
I.E, top, jungle, mid and bot. 
But I do stuff like this when im not busy.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWA8YwvIkjo

that stuff might help.

Depends on your definition of new.
I mainly do norms, but I wanna strive for more.
I have mastered a few champs but yea.
the vid did help a bit, with the whole paying attention and staying after i gank to push tower.
send us a friend req. would like to play with ya. wanna see if i can get any more tips off you

I may or may not be able too, I Live with house mates now and our line connection is really bad.
Sometimes I would spike randomly for no reason up to 3K or just disconnect entirely, 
All I can do really is spectate or hope it all works XD

If anything else, tr watching other (Better) league youtubers.
GBAY99 and Foxdrop are really good ones.

I know the feels, I live with 8 people in one house that all use the wifi, without NBN or nothin. just plain old wifi. occasionly spikes but thats why i usually play during the night, when everyone is usually asleep and the wifi is at its peak.

cheers though for the advice, much appreciated
